comment: The text book is an online book you use to turn in ALL of your assingments (book is about $100). On day one the syllabus lays everything out for you. This class is very structured but it changed a lot on us and was never updated online. Pearch offers a lot of extra credit. All you have to do is study for the tests because they are challenging.
Pearch is a great prof-unlike the majority of my other professors. He is approachable, cares and is a cool guy.

Instructor Pearch was a great instructor for this awful course. He does not take late work and if you attend class and have half a brain you will do well. Comments about his class being hard are from people who don't pay attention to due dates and don't come to class.
Easy class, He was very laid back, everything except quizzes and exams were easy A's. The power points were online, but the tests and quizzes were hard. Ended with an A.

Did not like him. He takes this course way too seriously. This class is easy if you go every single day. He gives you a study guide, and then you take the test and there are tons of questions on there that were not on the study guide. Avoid him if you can.
Dropped his class after the fisrt day, the syllabus was 10 pages and ridiculous, dont take him!

I took Professor's Pearch in the Fall of 2012. The class is a university requirement (Thanks KSU) and the book is not great. However, Professor Pearch is awesome and he knows the material well. He made the class interesting and I began working out again!

This was a good class. The professor was on time and he had reviews for the test. Quizzes were taken with another class but it was fine as long as you listen to the other professor teaching and did your work you were suppose to do.

VERY EASY CLASS!! just make sure you come to every class(takes down attendance) & do all the work. labs are very easy and so are the group projects. there are a few pop quizzes(which i did bad on), but i managed to get an A in the class!! also gives a lot of extra credit opportunities, but as long as you do all the work in class, it should be fine!

For such a ridiculous required class, he made it tolerable. He is fair, not a pushover, and doesn't take a baby approach to the material, but he's really laid back and kinda funny sometimes. There's nothing worse than a power hungry gen-ed health professor, and he is not like that at all.
Enjoyed this class a lot even though I had taken a similar class in High School and it was basically the same information. I did enjoy the few projects we did and the class was pretty simplistic.

Easy class. If you do the work and show up for exam reviews then it's an easy A. Plenty of opportunities for extra credit. He knows his stuff and tells you what you need to know without overloading with unnecessary information.

Ppl just do the work...it's nowhere near hard to get an A out this class. He's very laid back and cool and gives u a number of opporunties for extra credit. If you can't handle this...u can't handle anything.
He's the best and very understanding and cool...just do your work and you should pass...if you don't pass this class u dumb and shouldn't be in college...j/k.LOL. No but he's amazing.
great guy easy teacher.

Very easy class. He is also very understanding. Just complete all the labs and projects and do ok on the tests and you will make an A. This class is boring no matter who you have. He at least just gives you what you need to know and moves on to the next chapter.
Really easy, helpful teacher. Very nice, is  very flexible. Easy class, great guy. Makes a boring class as fun as it can be. Show up to class, stay for the reviews, A+

If you do what you need to do, you'll get an A. yes, there are a lot of work, but they are so easy. My average score of 3 exams were about 80, but I made an A in this class because of the extra credit.

Horrible. Just horrible. Did no review for any test. Boring PowerPoint-based lectures. Only thing he was passionate about was bringing us to the gym. If you ask him a question, he'll barely answer it, if he answers it at all. Take someone else, he sucks.
HORRIBLE TEACHER...DOESN'T GIVE REVIEW WHERE ELSE OTHER TEACHERS DO...NOT HELPFUL @ ALL...TAKE ANY OTHER HPS TEACHER THAN HIM
easy, lots of work though and labs. Test are hard if you do not look over notes.
